member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO
member.summary: Provides information about the media supported by a device.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific
member.summary: A union that contains the following members.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.DiskInfo
member.summary: A structure that contains the following members.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.DiskInfo.Cylinders
member.summary: The number of cylinders on this disk.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.DiskInfo.MediaType
member.summary: The media type. This member can be one of the values from the or enumeration types.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.DiskInfo.TracksPerCylinder
member.summary: The number of tracks per cylinder.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.DiskInfo.SectorsPerTrack
member.summary: The number of sectors per track.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.DiskInfo.BytesPerSector
member.summary: The number of bytes per sector.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.DiskInfo.NumberMediaSides
member.summary: The number of sides of the disk that can contain data. This member is 1 for one-sided media or 2 for two-sided media.

summary.para: The characteristics of the media. This member can be one or more of the following values.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.RemovableDiskInfo
member.summary: A structure that contains the following members.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.RemovableDiskInfo.Cylinders
member.summary: The number of cylinders on this disk.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.RemovableDiskInfo.MediaType
member.summary: The media type. This member can be one of the values from the or enumeration types.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.RemovableDiskInfo.TracksPerCylinder
member.summary: The number of tracks per cylinder.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.RemovableDiskInfo.SectorsPerTrack
member.summary: The number of sectors per track.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.RemovableDiskInfo.BytesPerSector
member.summary: The number of bytes per sector.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.RemovableDiskInfo.NumberMediaSides
member.summary: The number of sides of the disk that can contain data. This member is 1 for one-sided media or 2 for two-sided media.

summary.para: The characteristics of the media. This member can be one or more of the following values.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.TapeInfo
member.summary: A structure that contains the following members.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.TapeInfo.MediaType
member.summary: The media type. This member can be one of the values from the or enumeration types.

summary.para: The characteristics of the media. This member can be one or more of the following values.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.TapeInfo.CurrentBlockSize
member.summary: The current block size, in bytes.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.TapeInfo.BusType
member.summary: The type of bus to which the tape drive is connected. This members can be one of the enumeration values.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.TapeInfo.BusSpecificData
member.summary: A union that contains the following members.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.TapeInfo.BusSpecificData.ScsiInformation
member.summary: A structure that contains the following members.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.TapeInfo.BusSpecificData.ScsiInformation.MediumType
member.summary: The SCSI-specific medium type.

member.name: DEVICE_MEDIA_INFO.DeviceSpecific.TapeInfo.BusSpecificData.ScsiInformation.DensityCode
member.summary: The SCSI-specific current operating density for read/write operations.
